Metadata.title: WebGue | Build Modern with WebGue
Metadata.description: Create stunning, high-performance websites effortlessly with WebsiteAja.

Hero.description: Create stunning, high-performance websites effortlessly with WebsiteAja.

GetStarted.title: Effortless website solutions, tailored for your success.
GetStarted.description: This reflects simplicity, ease of use, and a focus on delivering results for customers. Feel free to adjust it according to your vision!

Benefits.title: WebGue made easy
Benefits.description: In today's digital age, having a strong online presence is crucial for businesses of all sizes. Our website creation services offer you the perfect solution to establish and grow your brand online.

feature-1.title: Custom Designs Tailored to Your Brand
feature-1.description: We understand that every business is unique. Our team creates custom website designs that reflect your brand identity and engage your target audience effectively.

feature-2.title: SEO Optimization
feature-2.description: Our websites are optimized for search engines from the ground up. This helps improve your visibility online and boost your ranking on search engine results pages.

feature-3.title: Ongoing Support and Maintenance
feature-3.description: Our commitment doesnâ€™t end at launch. We offer ongoing support and maintenance to ensure your website remains up-to-date, secure, and performing at its best.
feature-3.skeleton-description: We ensure your website stays secure and updated.

feature-4.title: Hosting over the edge
feature-4.description: Edge web hosting is a system that allows websites and web apps to be hosted closer to their users.

Pricing.title: Choose the plan that's right for you

basic-plan.title: Basic Plan
basic-plan.description: Affordable and straightforward, perfect for small websites. Ideal for personal projects or small businesses.
basic-plan.feature-2: SEO Basic: On-page optimization for basic search visibility

standard-plan.title: Standard Plan
standard-plan.description: A balanced solution for growing businesses. Perfect for businesses looking to grow their online presence with more pages and better optimization.
standard-plan.feature-2: SEO Advanced: Includes keyword optimization and Google Analytics setup
standard-plan.feature-6: Support for design tweaks and updates
standard-plan.feature-7: Basic website maintenance: Includes security updates and bug fixes

custom-plan.title: Custom Plan
custom-plan.description: Completely tailored to your needs, no limits. Ideal for businesses or projects that require a custom-built solution, tailored features, and complete flexibility.
custom-plan.feature-1: Unlimited pages website design, tailored to your needs
custom-plan.feature-2: SEO Pro: Full SEO services including keyword analysis, backlinking, and content strategy
custom-plan.feature-3: Custom hosting storage (based on your requirements)
custom-plan.feature-7: Fully customized solutions based on your business goals
